briefTitle: Characterization of Circulating Tumor Cells (CTC-s) in Patients With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Stage IV Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Characterization of Circulating Tumor Cells (CTC-s) in Patients With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Stage IV Breast Cancer
conditions: Locally Advanced Breast Cancer, Metastatic (Stage IV) Breast Cancer, Stage III-IV Breast Cancer or Inflammatory
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Targets ER, Her2, and possible M30, VEGFR2, EGFR. Tumor cells found in blood stream.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients must be \> 18 years old.
* Patients are being treated for breast cancer at City of Hope (COH).
